channel.title: Donater status automaticly?
channel.description:
okay well i use paypal to get donations...
is there a way to make it, so once they donate $4 or more... it does something to make them donater in game? like, my donater is off a list
i've seen it done, runescape's done it.... any1 got a clue? all help apreciated!

item.title: Donater status automaticly?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“DuhPk, post:9, topic:271202”][quote author=silabgarza link=topic=357919.msg2734235#msg2734235 date=1238953313]
ugh i need professional help with this lmao

ppl just stating wat i just sed…

heres my theorys:
they donate with a button
paypal automaticly sends an email to you so u have to have ur own mysql email system?
it reads the email for the transaction, reads the donation amount, sends the donater an email perhaps? or maybe a website that gives u a code of some sort? i dont no… thats my idea
[/quote]
Your saying that you want them to get donator status on the server automatically once they donate?
Your server needs to be ran off MySQL for that.[/quote]The whole server, no. He’d just have to pull some JDBC functions.

Read full topic

item.title: Donater status automaticly?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:3, topic:271202”]im pretty sure has to do with mysql and stuff… and hacking paypal or something?[/quote]Naw. Paypal has ways for you to keep track of payments. I used to be part of the staff of another private server (non-RuneScape), and donations were put into a database on THEIR website as donations were sent in.

Read full topic
